result.execSummary:
The defendant Shaun P. MICKELL was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Posses THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Submot DNA sample.

timeConds.notes: Fifteen (15) days up front, under the Huber Law.   Transfer to Brown County Jail.   Forty-five (45) days, stayed, to be imposed upon the agent's discretion.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shaun P. MICKELL

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 08-06-15 at 9:30 a.m.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 06-04-15 at 2:45 p.m.
Plea date is set for 08-06-15 at 9:30 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 04-14-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
RE:  Possess THC -2nd and subsequent, on 03-11-15.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess THC-2nd or subsequent and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 03-30-15 at 2:30 p.m. Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and that he maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
